field.name: summary
field.value: After a restart in the server container, the proxies looses communication.

field.name: description
field.value:
After the restart of the server container, the client looses the comunication with the server, if the components are registered in the 'compoment' remoting mode.
There are 2 main reasons for that:
1 - The server component isn't registered after the restart 2 - The URI changes, after the restart.
See the RemoteComponentTestCase.ServerRestarted for a example.
